includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Frustrated by her failing marriage, a doctor (Emily Watson) engages in a spontaneous affair with a mysterious stranger (Ben Chaplin).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frustrated by her failing marriage, a doctor (Emily Watson) engages in a spontaneous affair with a mysterious stranger (Ben Chaplin).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Frustrated by her failing marriage, a doctor (Emily Watson) engages in a spontaneous affair with a mysterious stranger (Ben Chaplin).

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Yvonne struggles to carry on in the aftermath of the attack. With nowhere else to turn, she looks to a former lover for a solution.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Yvonne struggles to carry on in the aftermath of the attack. With nowhere else to turn, she looks to a former lover for a solution.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Yvonne struggles to carry on in the aftermath of the attack. With nowhere else to turn, she looks to a former lover for a solution.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Yvonne realises just how little she knew about Mark Costley as the full costs of accepting his help come to light.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Yvonne realises just how little she knew about Mark Costley as the full costs of accepting his help come to light.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Yvonne realises just how little she knew about Mark Costley as the full costs of accepting his help come to light.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As the trial continues, Yvonne prepares to tell her story, while the prosecution attacks Costley's claims. Series finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the trial continues, Yvonne prepares to tell her story, while the prosecution attacks Costley's claims. Series finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the trial continues, Yvonne prepares to tell her story, while the prosecution attacks Costley's claims. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: An unhappily married doctor begins a passionate affair with a complete stranger, unaware of how he will come to change her life. Tense thriller starring Emily Watson and Ben Chaplin.
